## Erc20.get() method

Get the token Metadata (name, symbol, etc...)

**Signature:**

```typescript
get(): Promise<Currency>;
```

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[Currency](./sdk.currency.md)&gt;

The token metadata

## Example

```javascript
const token = await contract.get();
```
